name: Nanoinformatics for Brain Delivery
description: Computational framework to optimise nanoparticle formulations for glioblastoma drug delivery.
bulletPoints: Built a computational nanoinformatics framework to optimise nanoparticle formulations over two years
Predicted paclitaxel delivery efficiencies up to 73% higher than reported literature benchmarks
Awards: Stripe Young Scientist 2026 Runner-Up, Smurfit Westrock Award, SciFest Maths in Science Award

name: Puzz
description: A web app for personalised group gaming.
bulletPoints: Built during Patch Summer Accelerator 2025
Reached 1,500 unique users within six weeks of development
Focus on personalised group gaming experiences

name: Automated Satellite Tracking System
description: Motorised tracking platform for amateur satellite observation and telemetry reception.
techStack: Arduino, L298N Motor Driver, DC Motors, Hardware Control
bulletPoints: Designed and built a motorised tracking platform for satellite observation
Implemented azimuthâ€“elevation control using worm-gear DC motors
Developed microcontroller-based position control on a tripod-mounted platform

name: Wireless GPS Telemetry System
description: Two-node GPS telemetry system for real-time location tracking.
techStack: Arduino, u-blox NEO-6M, HC-12 Wireless Module, TFT Display
bulletPoints: Built a two-node GPS telemetry system using Arduino
Implemented bidirectional wireless communication via HC-12 serial modules
Enabled handheld ground unit to visualize live coordinates and position data

name: Environmental Monitoring Station
description: Weather station collecting real-time environmental sensor data with web dashboard.
techStack: ESP32, Arduino, REST API, Web Dashboard
bulletPoints: Developed an Arduino/ESP32-based weather station
Created a custom backend API and web dashboard for live monitoring
Enabled historical analysis of environmental data

name: Basketball Bounce Modelling
description: Mathematical modelling and simulation of a basketball's bounce height as a function of internal air pressure.
bulletPoints: Developed a mathematical model to predict bounce height based on air pressure
Iterated from simple energy models to complex simulations involving aerodynamic drag
Achieved high accuracy with the 'True COR' model using the Shooting Method

name: iOS Karaoke Recorder
description: A minimal, correct reference implementation for simultaneous audio playback and recording on iOS.
bulletPoints: Simultaneous backing track playback and microphone recording using a single AVAudioEngine
Robust interruption handling for phone calls, Siri, and route changes
Real-time PCM buffer capture and local file storage

name: Personal Website
bulletPoints: Professional resume website with clean, print-friendly design
Modern CSS styling with Times New Roman typography and bordered layout
